title: Advanced Computer Science Courses
description: Completed intensive Advanced Computer Science programs focusing on high-level competitive programming and algorithmic mathematics. The curriculum covered advanced topics such as Dynamic Programming (DP), Suffix Array, and complex data structures including Trie, Treap, Implicit Treap, and Palindromic Tree. Gained deep expertise in Graph Theory (Bipartite Matching, Maximum Flow, Min-Cost Max-Flow), Computational Geometry (Convex Hull Trick), Number Theory, Sqrt Decomposition, and Triple Search. Explored Advanced Game Theory and sophisticated search algorithms. In Phase I (at ADA University), ranked 5th out of 100+ participants; in Phase II, maintained high engagement with a Progress Certificate.
